text: Hope Emerson (October 29, 1897 â€“ April 25, 1960) was an American actress. She acted in television and movies and on the stage. She played Evelyn Harper in Caged (1950). She also played a mail order bride in Westward the Women (1952). Emerson was born in Hawarden, Iowa. She died from liver disease at age 62. == References == Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Iowa Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Los Angeles Category:1897 births Category:1960 deaths
title: Hope Emerson
